name: Ruku's heart balloon
description:
"Ruku's heart balloon" is simple puzzle game! Kawaii!
Like a samegame.
The name of the rabbit is 'Ruku'.

I will aim to turn off the balloon a lot of high scores!
● Simple operation tap!
Disappears when you tap the heart have the same color adjacent two or more.

● simple but, I will aim to align the high scores the same color a lot! Deep!
High score will contain a lot of heart and turn off at the same time. Same as trying to erase the color line up!

● "FEVER" can erase a lot!
Also doubled score! To possible heart chain is fixed and will gauge the MAX FEVER!
